channel.description: Recent content in swap in droplets on Thoughts, Views & More...

item.title: Adding swap with a File in Your VPS
item.description: If you don’t have any additional disks, you can create a file somewhere on your filesystem, and use that file for swap space. Normally some vps providers don’t give swap. For those who has that type of vps will need this tutorial to get a swap to faster website or vps.
